mapper.insert: insert into orders(order_id, user_id, merchant_uid, total_price, payment_type, status, address, order_date, request_type) values (order_id_seq.nextval, #{user_id}, #{merchant_uid}, #{total_price}, #{payment_type}, #{status}, #{address}, sysdate, #{request_type})
insert into order_item(order_item_id, order_id, user_id, product_id, quantity, order_price) values(order_item_id_seq.nextval, #{order_id}, #{user_id}, #{product_id}, #{quantity}, #{order_price})
